Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2023-08-17)
------------------

* Removed the CosmoTransitions fork.


0.2.0 (2023-08-17)
------------------

* Upgraded algorithm for dealing with massless bounces.

------------------

* Restructure to handle multi-particle determinants.


0.0.1 (2022-01-23)
------------------

* Project initiated.
